name: Similar Snow Slopes
description:
STORY

You have decided to ski the slopes of the Snowy Slopes Resort. Make it to the bottom of the slope to conquer the mountain. Help the skier decide which path is correct by typing the synonym to the given word from two choices. Be careful of the debris, or your skiing trip will end much sooner than you expect!

CREDITS

This game was made as part of the CS394 Course at DeSales University. Credits go the following students:

Lucas Acosta-Morales: Level Design and Programming

Robert Young: Art Design

Alex Drozdowski: Interface and Sound Design
